channel.description: Recent content in Posts on This and That

item.title: Building a Url Shortner: Part 1
item.description: There are a lot of tutorials for projects in go, but a majority of them devolve into copy and pasting code to get something that works. I will try not to do that in this series. Another thing a lot of these things leave out is how much forethought and design go into a project. So, in the first part of this series, I’ll go through collecting requirements and do some initial design.
